title: His Willing Possession
description: “Have you made the decision to do this the hard way? Please say yes.”My life is a masquerade, so it’s only fitting I met him at a masked ball for the rich and privileged.Tall, dark, dangerous, the charismatic stranger lights a fire in me. But I should have known better than to play with the flames.“What would it take to be your lucky man?” he whispered.I fell for it. Fell for him.It’s the biggest mistake of my life.He isn’t a hero. He’s a threat.The stranger seduces me, then takes me to an isolated mansion in the mountains where I’m heldcaptive. But interrogating a Senator’s daughter isn’t the only thing he has on his mind.He wants my body. My heart. And the intoxicating chemistry between us makes me his willing possession.
author: S.R. Jones
